name: BipolarDiagnosis
title: Bipolar Diagnosis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of bipolar disorder.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of bipolar disorder.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
